d:
Wolf: Lamb, tell me a story.
Lamb: There was a hunter who knew Death couldn’t be hunted.
So he chose instead to give her a moment she would never forget.

Story & Story board by Lummh
Illustrated by Skyrilius

New page every 4 Mondays, or already avalaible on Patreon/SubscribeStar
